title: FS: Some misc. t206's cleaning out!
author: oldmancards

posts.post_title: FS: Some misc. t206's cleaning out!
posts.post_content:
Selling the following T206's. all nice cards with low to mid grades.
1. Shad Barry SGC 2 Piedmont $34
2. Red Kleinow SGC A Sweet Cap. double strike SOLD (nice centering and 
    eye appeal)
3. Ollie Pickering SGC 3 Piedmont 350 SOLD
4. Buck Herzog PSA 3 Piedmont 350-460 SOLD (looks much better)

All prices are delivered. Paypal FF net to me. Send paypal or questions to [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url]. First I'll take it gets the card.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=348977&d=1554060230[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=348979&d=1554060251[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=348980&d=1554060292[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=348981&d=1554060311[/IMG]
I’ll take the PSA Buck Herzog pending one question coming your way.

Hi Bob,

Sent an email earlier regarding the Red Kleinow. 

If that one is still available, and has no creases, I'd like to buy it!

Patrick
